sentences.en: A better way to inform users is with modeless feedback.
sentences.cn: 通常,通知用户更好的方式是非模态的反馈.

sentences.en: As discussed, the key to successful direct manipulation is rich visual feedback.
sentences.cn: 我们讨论过, 成功的直接操作的关键是丰富的视觉反馈.

sentences.en: But to be given negative feedback by a machine is an insult.
sentences.cn: 但是软件产生的负面反馈——无论是什么软件——都是一种侮辱.

sentences.en: Continue to ask for feedback on your work.
sentences.cn: 继续征求对你的工作的反馈意见。

sentences.en: Emitting noise when something bad happens is called negative audible feedback.
sentences.cn: 有问题时发出噪声称为“负面听觉反馈”.

sentences.en: How can I provide feedback without making someone angry?
sentences.cn: 我怎样才能提出反馈意见又不会得罪人呢？

sentences.en: I was getting great feedback from my boss.
I'd appreciate some feedback on my work.
sentences.cn: 如果有人对我的工作提出意见我将感激不尽。

sentences.en: Negative audible feedback has several things working against it.
sentences.cn: 这是负面反馈带来的问题,不关听觉反馈的事.

sentences.en: Other proportional feedback signals are generated from rate gyros.
sentences.cn: 其他的比例反馈讯号是由速率陀螺产生的.

sentences.en: Rich visual feedback is the key to successful direct manipulation.
sentences.cn: 丰富的视觉交互是直接操作成功的关键.

sentences.en: The element of feedback in rhizosphere process systems is probably considerable.
sentences.cn: 在根际作用体系中,反馈的养分元素,也许是相当重要的.

sentences.en: The more feedback we get from viewers, the better.
sentences.cn: 从观众那儿得到的反馈越多越好.

sentences.en: The process is essentially dynamic with ideas and feedback flowing both ways.
sentences.cn: 这个过程本质上是动态的,有各种建议与反馈的双向交流.

sentences.en: This behavior is the opposite of modeless feedback, and it hampers flow.
sentences.cn: 这个行为有悖于非模态的反馈, 它阻碍了流.

sentences.en: We discuss this idea of rich visual modeless feedback in Chapter 25.
sentences.cn: 我们将在第25章中讨论丰富的非模态视觉反馈.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 反馈机制，回馈机制
市场反馈；市场调查资料

trans.tran_en: advice, criticism etc about how successful or useful something is
